scripts.build: cd .. && npm run build && mkdir -p nimble-mobile/dist && cp -r out/* nimble-mobile/dist/
scripts.copy:web: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp -r ../out/* dist/
scripts.sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.run:ios: npm run sync && npx cap run ios
scripts.run:android: npm run sync && npx cap run android
